mapper.insert: insert into review_tb values(default, #{userId}, #{img}, #{content}, now(), now())
mapper.update: update review_tb set img = #{img}, content = #{content}, update_date = now() where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select rt.id, rt.user_id as userId, rt.img, rt.content, rt.register_date as registerDate, rt.update_date as updateDate, ut.name as userName, ut.img as userImg from review_tb rt left outer join user_tb ut on(rt.user_id = ut.id) where user_id = #{userId}

select rt.id, rt.user_id as userId, rt.img, rt.content, rt.register_date as registerDate, rt.update_date as updateDate, ut.name as userName, ut.img as userImg, (select count(*) from review_like_tb where review_id = rt.id) as likeCount, (select count(*) from review_like_tb where user_id = #{userId} and review_id = rt.id) as isLike from review_tb rt left outer join user_tb ut on(rt.user_id = ut.id) limit #{startIndex}, #{limit}
